posts.post_content:
Hello all, I’ve been locking for a couple years and have found a few examples, but they all have the same problem; not for sale. If you have a copy of this card, I’m your huckleberry!

Thanks,
Mark
You need to go back in the time machine to before they made The Gangs of New York”. Good luck Mark—they are out there.

Thanks Jay. I have found 5 thus far, but all in jail on life sentences. 

Mark
Still looking. Will even consider some paper loss. Anyone??
Still looking. The price one bought at Brockelman does not deter me, I just missed it :mad: maybe this is the week I get one!!!

After Mark gets his

Im looking for the 2nd available William Poole


If anyone else is looking for a Poole they can get in line behind Mark and I...bring a snack, it might take a while
